results.content: I am someone who gets intimidated by computer "language" while eager to learn about the immense possibilities of how it can help me build and increase my private practice. This has been at a pace and level in which I can understand without feeling overwhelmed.

results.content: This course was fantastic! Samuel was so great at explaining each step and really simplified the Wordpress website creation and maintenance process. The best part is that you don’t need any prior knowledge to enroll, I had no idea what I was doing before this course and now I feel confident enough to create a successful website for my business. It was very convenient too, I was able to complete it in one afternoon and get a jump start on my own website. I would highly recommend this course to anyone who is looking to build a website for themselves or for someone else as well as someone who just wants to learn something new !!

results.content: This course taught me an amazing skill set on how to design Wordpress websites for my own company saving me thousands of dollars on hiring a developer. I had 0 technical ability and now am able to take on clients designing Wordpress websites making money. I was able to get up and running quickly learning Wordpress, themes, plugins, and how to create a website from scratch. Samuel is a great instructor and I highly recommend purchasing this course.
